org.trianacode.gui.extensions

Class FileImportExportDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.extensions.FileImportExportDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FileImportExportDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Decorator design pattern implementation that adds import and export specific plugin functionality to file dialogs in Triana. The import and export filters are dynamically configured.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • showImportDialog

        public int showImportDialog(java.awt.Component parent)
        Pops up a "Import Taskgraph" file chooser dialog.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component of the dialog, can be null; see showDialog for details
        Returns:
        the return state of the file chooser on popdown:
        • JFileChooser.CANCEL_OPTION
        • JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION
        • JFileCHooser.ERROR_OPTION if an error occurs or the dialog is dismissed
        Throws:
        java.awt.HeadlessException - if GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless() returns true.
        See Also:
        GraphicsEnvironment.isHeadless()

      • showImportToolDialog

      • importWorkflow

        public TaskGraph importWorkflow()
                         throws TaskGraphException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Translates and returns the TaskGraph from the file choosen by the user.
        Returns:
        the imported taskgraph thrown if the taskgraph or workflow format is invalid or unparsable, non matching brackets for example.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a file IO problem.
        TaskGraphException

      • exportWorkflow

        public void exportWorkflow(TaskGraph taskgraph)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           TaskGraphException
        Converts the taskgraph to the appropriate format and writes it to the user choosen file.
        Parameters:
        taskgraph - the taskgraph to export
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is an IO problem writing the file.
        TaskGraphException

      • getDefaultToolPackage

        public java.lang.String getDefaultToolPackage()
        Returns:
        the current default package for imported tools.

      • importTools

        public Tool[] importTools(java.lang.String pack)
                   throws TaskGraphException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Translates and returns the an array of Tool objects from the file choosen by the user.
        Parameters:
        pack - the suggested package for imported tools
        pack -
        Returns:
        the imported tool thrown if the tool format is invalid or unparsable, non matching brackets for example.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if there is a file IO problem.
        TaskGraphException
